Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core

Interface StringLayout

All Superinterfaces:
Encoder<LogEvent>, Layout
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLayout, AbstractStringLayout, HtmlLayout, PatternLayout, Rfc5424Layout, SyslogLayout
public interface StringLayout extends Layout
Legacy interface from when layouts used to support more than strings or bytes.
